description: Lists reactions made by a user.
name: reactions.list

cursor.description: Parameter for pagination. Set `cursor` equal to the `next_cursor` attribute returned by the previous request's `response_metadata`. This parameter is optional, but pagination is mandatory: the default value simply fetches the first "page" of the collection. See [pagination](/docs/pagination) for more details.

full.description: If true always return the complete reaction list.

limit.description: The maximum number of items to return. Fewer than the requested number of items may be returned, even if the end of the list hasn't been reached.

user.description: Show reactions made by this user. Defaults to the authed user.
